text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea leptoderma is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is a tree endemic to Borneo where it is confined to Sabah.
text.References: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea leptoderma". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33422A9782902. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33422A9782902.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
